# <a name="address-book-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="8112c-102">Adresar u Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8112c-102">Address book in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8112c-103">Vaš adresar Outlook.com zove se ljudi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8112c-103">Your Outlook.com address book is called People.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8112c-104">Da biste stranicu tvoje [ljude](https://outlook.live.com/people/) , izaberite **osobe**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8112c-104">To go to your [People](https://outlook.live.com/people/) page, select **People**</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="8112c-105">u donjem uglu stranice ili iz biraču aplikaciju u gornjem uglu stranice.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8112c-105">at the bottom corner of the page, or from the app selector at the top corner of the page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8112c-106">Saznajte kako da [Kreiranje, prikaz i uređivanje kontakata u Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/5b909158-036e-4820-92f7-2a27f57b9f01?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8112c-106">Learn how to [Create, view, and edit contacts in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/5b909158-036e-4820-92f7-2a27f57b9f01?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
